title: Can we buy both championship ashe chroma and border in the event thing
body: I would like to know if we'll be able to buy both the 320 world token pack and the other worth 120 just to make sure

replies.body: I believe he was asking how many points we'll be able to acquire in total, assume that all missions are completed with and without the worlds pass. IE - If I complete every single mission before December 2nd (last day iirc?), will I have enough to buy both the boarder and chroma. To which I assume the answer is yes.
It would be really annoying to spend money on the worlds pass and not get both
Demoncakes was right that was my question sorry im french canadian * XD

You'll still have access to free missions after obtaining a Worlds missions pass.  The chroma isn't available for RP, so you'll want to complete the missions to obtain those tickets as it won't just load up on your account.  I hope that helps!
